product_name: Thule Cross Country Ski / Hike Kit
long_description: The Thule Cross Country Ski / Hike Kit converts your Thule Chariot Stroller for use on cross-country ski trails or as a pull-behind carrier for hiking. Adjustable length of tow bars for ease of use. Child is off the ground for warmth and comfort. Simple and easy installation. Includes 2 lightweight skis, 2 telescoping aluminum tow bars, padded waist belt with bottle holder and locking pin. Compatable with all Thule Chariot Strollers and carriers (sold separately).
short_description: The Thule Cross Country Ski / Hike Kit converts your Thule Chariot Stroller for use on cross-country ski trails or as a pull-behind carrier for hiking.
